about_the_game:
There is no better way to immerse yourself in space exploration with our friend Bea, than with these 11 amazing music tracks. Let this atmospheric music guide your senses, while you find your way home.

ARTISTS:
Composed by: Bartosz Chajdecki
Performed by: B.A.Ch. Film Ensemble
Session development: Fryderyk Lutyński
Loops, beats: Patryk Nawrocki
Electronics: Andrzej Trześniowski
Music mix: Michał Woźniak

Composed by: Jan Sanejko
Additionally performed by: Marta Sołek (cello in 1 - Main Theme)
